com.digi.xbee.api

Class RemoteXBeeDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.digi.xbee.api.AbstractXBeeDevice
      • com.digi.xbee.api.RemoteXBeeDevice
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RemoteDigiMeshDevice, RemoteDigiPointDevice, RemoteRaw802Device, RemoteZigBeeDevice

    public class RemoteXBeeDevice
extends AbstractXBeeDevice
    This class represents a remote XBee device.
    See Also:
    RemoteDigiMeshDevice, RemoteDigiPointDevice, RemoteRaw802Device, RemoteZigBeeDevice

      Class constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isRemote()
      Always returns true, since it is a remote device.
      void reset()
      Performs a software reset on this XBee device and blocks until the process is completed.
      String toString()

    • Constructor Detail

      • RemoteXBeeDevice

        public RemoteXBeeDevice(XBeeDevice localXBeeDevice,
                XBee64BitAddress addr64)
        Class constructor. Instantiates a new RemoteXBeeDevice object with the given local XBeeDevice which contains the connection interface to be used.
        Parameters:
        localXBeeDevice - The local XBee device that will behave as connection interface to communicate with this remote XBee device.
        addr64 - The 64-bit address to identify this remote XBee device.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if localXBeeDevice.isRemote() == true.
        NullPointerException - if localXBeeDevice == null or if addr64 == null.
        See Also:
        XBee64BitAddress

      • RemoteXBeeDevice

        public RemoteXBeeDevice(XBeeDevice localXBeeDevice,
                XBee64BitAddress addr64,
                XBee16BitAddress addr16,
                String ni)
        Class constructor. Instantiates a new RemoteXBeeDevice object with the given local XBeeDevice which contains the connection interface to be used.
        Parameters:
        localXBeeDevice - The local XBee device that will behave as connection interface to communicate with this remote XBee device.
        addr64 - The 64-bit address to identify this remote XBee device.
        addr16 - The 16-bit address to identify this remote XBee device. It might be null.
        ni - The node identifier of this remote XBee device. It might be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if localXBeeDevice.isRemote() == true.
        NullPointerException - if localXBeeDevice == null or if addr64 == null.
        See Also:
        XBee16BitAddress, XBee64BitAddress

    • Method Detail

      • isRemote

        public boolean isRemote()
        Always returns true, since it is a remote device.
        Specified by:
        isRemote in class AbstractXBeeDevice
        Returns:
        true always.

      • reset

        public void reset()
           throws TimeoutException,
                  XBeeException
        Description copied from class: AbstractXBeeDevice
        Performs a software reset on this XBee device and blocks until the process is completed.
        Specified by:
        reset in class AbstractXBeeDevice
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - if the configured time expires while waiting for the command reply.
        XBeeException - if there is any other XBee related exception.

        Overrides:
